column6: Great product but why is the price so high?
column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2020
column14: I love this handsoap. It is the only one I can use for my extremely sensitive skin. Used to buy these all the time - this EXACT item. It was a great deal - about $6.00 for 6 bottles.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2020
column14: This is my favorite hand soap, it was sold out everywhere (along with all other soaps). I was price gouged heavily by paying 20 dollars for 6. In normal times this item sells for about 98 cents per bottle. Shame on Amazon. I still gave 5 stars because the soap itself is excellent.

column14: Dear Makers of Softsoap (and anyone considering buying),

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2019
column14: The great price is what caught my eye initially. The smell is light which is a great feature , and the kids love the colorful fish, and couldn't wait to open the box. The fast delivery time just adds to the overall  satisfaction.

column14: At this time with all of us washing our hands more & much of the country still in heating season (drier air). This particular soap Softsoap Liquid hand soap w/Alo Vera  not only cleans your hands but moisturizes them as well.
